All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AuthenticationDialog
The AuthenticationDialog class represents a custom JDialog used for displaying an authentication dialog
AuthenticationTest
Test class for Authentication
AuthListener
The class is a UI controller that handles authentication actions (logging in and signing up) in the Klotski game.
AuthListenerTest
Test class for AuthListener
Block
The Block class represents a custom JLabel used to display and interact with klotski pieces
BlockTest
Test class for Block
BoardTest
Test class for Board
Buttons
The Buttons class represents a panel containing the set of game buttons
Controller
Controller class initialize Database and the UI View, with the related listener
ControllerTest
Test class for Controller
Database
The Database class provides methods to interact with database hosted by AWS for saving and retrieving game data
DatabaseTest
Test class for Database
DisconnectionListenerTest
Test class for DisconnectionListener
Klotski
Class that represent the whole Klotski Game
KlotskiControllerTest
The KlotskiControllerTest class is an abstract class that serves as a base for controllers test
KlotskiModel
Class that handle the interaction with Model package (model facade)
KlotskiModelTest
Test class for KlotskiModel
KlotskiUI
Class that handle the interaction with View package (view facade)
KlotskiUITest
Test class for KlotskiUI
Main
 
Move
The Move class provides methods to store and manipulate game moves
MoveTest
Test class for Move
RestartCommandTest
Test class for RestartCommand
SaveCommandTest
Test class for SaveCommand
SavedGamesDialog
A dialog for displaying saved games
SavedGamesDialogTest
Test class for SavedGamesDialog
Solver
The Solver class provides functionality for solving a puzzle game by making an API request to an AWS lambda
SolverTest
Test class for Solver
StateTest
Test class for State
UndoCommandTest
Test class for UndoCommand
